TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class BitArray : ICloneable, System.Collections.ICollection

.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit BitArray extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class BitArray Implements ICloneable, ICollection
public ref class BitArray sealed : ICloneable, System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where indicates that the bit is on (1) and indicates the bit is off (0).

span.span: Manages a compact array of bit values, which are represented as Booleans, where indicates that the bit is on (1) and indicates the bit is off (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是在其中的容量等同一律為計數集合類別。The class is a collection class in which the capacity is always the same as the count. 項目會加入藉由增加屬性; 刪除項目藉由降低屬性。Elements are added to a by increasing the property; elements are deleted by decreasing the property. 大小控制用戶端，則索引超過結尾會擲回。類別提供方法，包括允許修改一次使用篩選器，例如多個元素的其他集合中找不到， ， ， ，和.The size of a is controlled by the client; indexing past the end of the throws an .The class provides methods that are not found in other collections, including those that allow multiple elements to be modified at once using a filter, such as , , , , and . 類別是提供做為相同的功能結構，但更快的效能。The class is a structure that provides the same functionality as , but with faster performance. 因為它是實值類型速度會加快，因此在堆疊上配置而是參考類型，因此，在堆積上配置。 is faster because it is a value type and therefore allocated on the stack, whereas is a reference type and, therefore, allocated on the heap. 可以儲存完全 32 位元，而可以儲存可變位元數。 can store exactly 32 bits, whereas can store a variable number of bits. 儲存位元旗標和小整數，因此它適用於資料未公開給使用者。 stores both bit flags and small integers, thereby making it ideal for data that is not exposed to the user. 不過，如果必要的位元旗標的數目為未知，是變數，或大於 32，使用改為。However, if the number of required bit flags is unknown, is variable, or is greater than 32, use instead. 處於命名空間。處於命名空間。 is in the namespace; is in the namespace. 可以使用整數索引來存取此集合中的項目。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化以及如何列印其值。The following code example shows how to create and initialize a and how to print out its values. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a .

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的第一個位元組代表位元 0 到 7，第二個位元組代表位元 8 到 15，依此類推。The first byte in the array represents bits 0 through 7, the second byte represents bits 8 through 15, and so on. 每個位元組的最重要的位元代表最小的索引值:" `bytes` [0] （& s) 1" 代表位元 0、" `bytes` [0] （& s) 代表位元 1、 2"" `bytes` [0] （& s) 4" 代表位元 2，依此類推。The Least Significant Bit of each byte represents the lowest index value: " `bytes` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `bytes` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `bytes` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on. 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的項目數`bytes`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `bytes`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在第一個數字`values`陣列項目代表位元 0 到 31，陣列中的第二個數字代表位元 32 到 63，依此類推。The number in the first `values` array element represents bits 0 through 31, the second number in the array represents bits 32 through 63, and so on. 每個整數的最重要的位元代表最小的索引值:" `values` [0] （& s) 代表位元 0，1"" `values` [0] （& s) 代表位元 1、 2"" `values` [0] （& s) 4" 代表位元 2，依此類推。The Least Significant Bit of each integer represents the lowest index value: " `values` [0] & 1" represents bit 0, " `values` [0] & 2" represents bit 1, " `values` [0] & 4" represents bit 2, and so on. 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是中的項目數`values`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `values`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位元 AND 運算傳回`true`如果這兩個運算元都是`true`，並傳回`false`如果一或兩個運算元都是`false`。The bitwise AND operation returns `true` if both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if one or both operands are `false`. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行位元 AND 運算，兩個物件。The following code example shows how to perform the bitwise AND operation between two objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的淺層複本只會複製元素的集合，不論它們是參考類型或實值類型，但是不會複製參考所參考的物件。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新的集合中的參考都指向相同原始集合中的參考所指向的物件。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 相反地，項目複製集合的深層複本，並直接或間接參考之項目，所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the entire .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和傳回相同的值。 and return the same value. 您可以將特定的值，但處於唯讀狀態。 can be set to a specific value, but is read-only. 如果設定的值為小於、會被截斷，以及在索引之後的元素`value`-1 會被刪除。If is set to a value that is less than , the is truncated and the elements after the index `value` -1 are deleted. 如果設為大於 1 的值，新的項目會設為`false`。If is set to a value that is greater than , the new elements are set to `false`. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 將這個屬性設定為 O (`n`) 作業。Setting this property is an O(`n`) operation.

exception.span: The property is set to a value that is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位元 OR 運算傳回`true`如果一或兩個運算元都是`true`，並傳回`false`如果這兩個運算元都是`false`。The bitwise OR operation returns `true` if one or both operands are `true`, and returns `false` if both operands are `false`. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行 OR 運算，兩個物件。The following code example shows how to perform the OR operation between two objects. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的、 直接依據。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BitArray Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BitArray Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位元排除 OR 運算傳回`true`如果只有一個運算元為`true`，並傳回`false`如果兩個運算元有相同的布林值。The bitwise exclusive OR operation returns `true` if exactly one operand is `true`, and returns `false` if both operands have the same Boolean value. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行兩個 XOR 作業物件。The following code example shows how to perform the XOR operation between two objects.
